channel.title: Black Mesa SOUNDTRACK MIX - Questionable Ethics 1 MIX
channel.description:
Hi,
when I was listening to the Bl:lambda:ck Mesa Soundtrack :bms: I thought 'some tracks are too short' (especially "Questionable Ethics 1"), and I wanted some of them in a special sequence.
So I started creating a "Black Mesa Suite" with an escalating character, finishing it with a long version of "Questionable Ethics 1" (about 8 min!). B) I used FLAC format, converted to 320Kb mp3. What do you think? [quote] [align=center][COLOR='Yellow']Black Mesa Escalation Suite[/SIZE] [COLOR='Gray'][14:57 min][/SIZE]
including Questionable Ethics 1 (extended extended)[/SIZE][/align]
> [b][COLOR='Red']You[COLOR='White']Tube[/b][/SIZE] [align=center][url=https://youtu.be/yWroXFu7ZDE][img]https://www.zauberbarni.bplaced.net/otherstuff/BlackMesaEscalationSuite.jpg[/img][/url][/align]
> [b][COLOR='RoyalBlue']Download[/b][/SIZE] [align=center][url]https://www.filefactory.com/file/5hfyw78gpnez/n/BlackMesaEscalationSuite_zierbengel_avi[/url][/align] [/quote]
[quote] [align=center][COLOR='Yellow']Questionable Ethics 1[/SIZE] (extended extended)[/SIZE] [COLOR='Gray'][8:06 min][/SIZE][/align]
> [b][COLOR='Red']You[COLOR='White']Tube[/b][/SIZE] [align=center][url]https://youtu.be/-sOgO0moGR0[/url][/align]
> [b][COLOR='RoyalBlue']Download[/b][/SIZE] [align=center][url]https://www.filefactory.com/file/3u7ju91okky9/n/QuestionableEthics1_zierbengel_avi[/url][/align] [/quote] [align=center]Have Fun! [img]https://www.zauberbarni.bplaced.net/otherstuff/gifpics/jumping.gif[/img][/align]

item.title: Black Mesa SOUNDTRACK MIX - Questionable Ethics 1 MIX
item.dc:creator: D3lta
item.description:
Not bad.But I think it wont fit during the battle, because it will just keep playing for 8 minutes straight while the average players finishes the battle within 1 - 2 minutes on normal.

item.title: Black Mesa SOUNDTRACK MIX - Questionable Ethics 1 MIX
item.dc:creator: zierbengel
item.description:
Hi,

when I was listening to the Bl:lambda:ck Mesa Soundtrack :bms: I thought ‘some tracks are too short’ (especially “Questionable Ethics 1”), and I wanted some of them in a special sequence.

So I started creating a “Black Mesa Suite” with an escalating character, finishing it with a long version of “Questionable Ethics 1” (about 8 min!). B)
I used FLAC format, converted to 320Kb mp3.
What do you think?

[align=center][COLOR=‘Yellow’]Black Mesa Escalation Suite[/SIZE]
[COLOR=‘Gray’][14:57 min][/SIZE]

including Questionable Ethics 1 (extended extended)[/SIZE][/align]

[COLOR=‘Red’]You[COLOR=‘White’]Tube[/SIZE]
[align=center][/align]

(extended extended)[/SIZE]
